title: Tuchel-Conte Headlines Battle at the Bridge
description:
The FC crew discuss a controversial London Derby that ended with both managers sent off as Tottenham fight back for a 2-2 draw at Chelsea. Plus, Erik ten Hag enforces retributions after Man United's terrible 4-0 loss to Brentford and reports surface that a small rift is being introduced at PSG between Neymar and Kylian Mbappe.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Conte and Tuchel dust-up headlines fierce 2-2 draw between Spurs and Chelsea; Man United fallout after 4-0 loss; Neymar and Mbappe rift forming?
